title: The Financial and Economic Crisis - Collection 25
description:
The Financial and Economic Crisis - Collection 25:

We have 35 titles here:

-  Akerlof et al (Eds.) - What Have We Learned; Macroeconomic Policy after the Crisis (2014)

-  Arestis & Karakitsos - The Post-Bubble US Economy, Implications for Financial Markets and the Economy (2004)

-  Barthalon - Uncertainty, Expectations, and Financial Instability (2014)

-  Bellofiore et al - Economic Crisis and Political Economy; Vol. 2 or Essays in Honour of Tadeusz Kowalik (2014)

-  Brooks - The Go-Go Years; the Drama and Crashing Finale of Wall Street's Bullish 60s (1999)

-  Brummer - Bad Banks; Greed, Incompetence and the Next Global Crisis (2014)

-  Cesa (Ed) - Post-Crisis Quant Finance (2013)

-  Chandler - The Fall of Logic; the Deceit of Conventional Financial Wisdom (2014)

-  Collins - How the Mighty Fall, and Why Some Companies Never Give in (2009)

-  Conti-Brown & Skeel (Eds.) - When States Go Broke; the Origins, Context, and Solutions for the American States in Fiscal Crisis (2012)

-  de Bruin - Ethics and the Global Financial Crisis; Why Incompetence is Worse than Greed (2015)

-  Desai & Said (Eds.) - Global Governance and Financial Crises (2004)

-  Deshpande & Nurse (Eds.) - The Global Economic Crisis and the Developing World; Implications and Prospects for Recovery and Growth (2012)

-  Duignan (Ed.) - The Great Depression (2013)

-  Eichengreen - Hall of Mirrors; the Great Depression, the Great Recession, and the Uses and Misuses of History (2015)

-  Fisman & Miguel - Economic Gangsters; Corruption, Violence and the Poverty of Nations (2008)

-  Fraser - Shredded; Inside RBS, the Bank That Broke Britain (2014)

-  French - Walk Away; the Rise and Fall of the Home-Ownership Myth (2010)

-  Galbraith - Inequality and Instability; a Study of the World Economy Just Before the Great Crisis (2012)

-  Gosselin - High Wire; the Precarious Financial Lives of American Families (2008)

-  Guerin et al (Eds.) - Microfinance, Debt and Over-Indebtedness; Juggling with Money (2014)

-  Hendrickson - Financial Crisis; the United States in the Early 21st Century (2013)

-  Lucey et al (Eds.) - What if Ireland Default (2012)

-  McDonald - Fannie Mae & Freddie Mac; Turning the American Dream into a Nightmare (2012)

-  Patel - Investing Unplugged; Secrets from the Inside (2005)

-  Rapp - Bubbles, Booms, and Busts; the Rise and Fall of Financial Assets, 2e (2015)

-  Reynolds - False Profits; Seeking Financial and Spiritual Deliverance in Multi-Level Marketing and Pyramid Schemes (1997)

-  Roberts - Gambling with Other People's Money; How Perverted Incentives Caused the Financial Crisis (2010)

-  Roth - The Great Depression; a Diary (2009)

-  Schrag - Repay as You Earn; the Flawed Government Program to Help Students Have Public Service Careers (2002)

-  Scott et al (Eds.) - Ending Government Bailouts as We Know Them (2010)

-  Starkman - The Watchdog That Didn't Bark; the Financial Crisis and the Disappearance of Investigative Journalism (2014)

-  Toporowski - Why the World Economy Needs a Financial Crash, and Other Critical Essays on Finance and Financial Economics (2010)

-  Wallison - Hidden in Plain Sight; What Really Caused the World's Worst Financial Crisis and Why It Could Happen Again (2015)

-  Woods - Meltdown; a Free-Market Look at Why the Stock Market Collapsed, the Economy Tanked, ... (2009)
